desc: language learning institution that offers comprehensive courses and resources for individuals interested in mastering the Japanese language. I was responsible for designing and developing the front-end interface, ensuring a user-friendly experience. The project involved creating interactive lessons, quizzes, and a progress tracking system using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.

intro: A Blog about Japanese Language and Culture
desc: This project is a blog platform dedicated to sharing articles, insights, and resources related to the Japanese language and culture. I developed the front-end using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS, focusing on creating an engaging and visually appealing layout. The blog features categories, tags, and a search functionality to help users easily find content of interest.
